children.text: On key 1 pressed Toggle Pistol, AR and Ammotype- this is used later in the code
If bullets collides with these objects they would be destroyed to simulate a solid object
if pistol ammo is less then zero set pistol to fasle and set the ammo display to 0
if AR ammo is less then zero set AR to fasle and set the ammo display to 0

In these line of codes it focuses on the enemies damage taken from the bullets from the player, the elite have a shield so there is a boolean to check if the elite has lost its shields by using a 3 second timer, if during the 3 seconds the elite has taken damage it will reset the timer
The damage done to the grunt from both pistol and AR less advanced then the elite as it does not have a shield
If the bullet comes in contact with these objects it will destroy the bullet to represent that it is hitting the object
If player shield is less than or equal to 0 disable player shield and activate the health boolean
if the enemy bullet come into contact to player and shield is active the shield will take damage and recharge would be set to false (to prevent a momentary invincibility)
this is the same thing but without shields
if the timer reached 3 the elite may begin recharging shields
if elite has los of player the elite will move towards player and if a enemy barricade is in the way the elite will lose sight of player
this is the enemies shoot function if the elite has los it will spawn a bullet every 0.2 and play the audio
When the elite shield has reached 0 the damage will now be set on to the base health of the elite

when a elite dies a death sfx will play and a ammobox will spawn making it easier for player to get ammo- global variables will lose -1 to indicate that the player has romoved a enemy from the selected amount
This is where the elite gets its shield recharged it will add 15 in under 0.4 seconds multiple times and then setting echarge falls and setting the damage to be on the shields
to prevent overshields
if the enemy is not being damaged the timer can add up to 3
this is for the player- if the player is overlapping the enemy bullet the time will be reset so the shield can not activate recharge
its exactly the same as the elite
this is for the battle music- when the player has been spotted by los battle music will begin playing using a global variable to start the main music back to exactly where it is
when the battle ended return to the main background sound to the exact second it was played
this is a different text for the first part

parameters.text: "Eliminate all Covenant forces in the area:" &Enemiespart2

children.text: this helps show how much ammo the player has by subtracting it from the counter
depending on which angle the player stands at the animation will change its angle to the right to make it look like its moving towards it
when the players base health reaches zero the player box will be destroyed
only in the final event if the player dies they would go to the end game screen
if they are not in the final game the player will restart the layout
when the timer reaches 3 seconds the players shields can recharge
the code has been set up like this to simulate the recharge animation not for any other reasons
if it goes over 150 it will reset back to  150
this is for the ui display depending on the health it will display it
When the player collides with the healthpack the player will receive 50 hp
If the player health exceeds 100 the health would be set to 100 hp
When the player presses Q and is overlapping the enemy - the player will deal 100 damage to targeted enemy
